intro.SubA: A resume page of Thomas X. Grasso
intro.SubB: see how he can benifit your company below.

about.Title: About
about.SubTitle: Who's Thomas Xavier Grasso the III?

slideshow.SlideParaA: From the suburbs of Cranberry Pa, I went to highschool at Seneca Valley where I was a member of the varcity lacross team and the quad player for the SV marching band drum-line. As an ameture artist, I combined my passion for metal work and sculpting to create metal sculptures of all kinds.
slideshow.SlideParaB: From the suburbs of Cranberry Pa, I went to highschool at Seneca Valley where I was a member of the varcity lacross team and the quad player for the SV marching band drum-line. As an ameture artist, I combined my passion for metal work and sculpting to create metal sculptures of all kinds.
slideshow.SlideParaC: From the suburbs of Cranberry Pa, I went to highschool at Seneca Valley where I was a member of the varcity lacross team and the quad player for the SV marching band drum-line. As an ameture artist, I combined my passion for metal work and sculpting to create metal sculptures of all kinds.

specialization.SpecSubTitle: What can I provide for your company?

specbox.BoxParaA: With acurate creative thinking skills, I can carry an idea for your company and make it into an acurate, eliquent reality with several realities to choose from.
specbox.BoxParaB: Coding capabilities that are both adiquet and versitile with a knowledgable undestanding of html, scss, javascript, php, and react.
specbox.BoxParaC: With experience in digital art programs from adobe programs to sketch to figma, my expertiece provides an excellent understanding and execution in use to create stunning digital artwork.
specbox.BoxParaD: Providing excelence in fine art skills from illustration to shading and even sculpting, my skillset can carry an idea on paper without the use of technology.

jobbox.JobPara2A: Qintel located in Pittsburgh PA. is one of the top cyber security companies in the nation which served as an excellent synthesis for my graphic design and coding background.
jobbox.JobPara3A: Responsibilities included merchandise design, business paraphanalia design (brochures, product fliers, ex.), ux/ui for various company matenance materials, and invessigation participation.
